biotools.summary: Allows users to analyze genotyping data of their Mycobacterium tuberculosis strains either alone or in comparison with the reference DB of strains. The web server also includes tools to search for similar strains, phylogenetic analysis and mapping of geographic information.

bioschemas.name: MIRU-VNTRplus
bioschemas.summary: Allows users to analyze genotyping data of their Mycobacterium tuberculosis strains either alone or in comparison with the reference DB of strains. The web server also includes tools to search for similar strains, phylogenetic analysis and mapping of geographic information.
